text: Hey Guys, How can I include bootstrap into my template so that its available for all modules to use it?
you can add it from here in drag and drop template
in html template you can use <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/hubl/functions#get-asset-url|get assets url>  or  <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/hubl/functions#require-js|require-js>
Is there a way to output the number of repeater items so I can have a label saying something like - 150 results??
I think you're looking for loop.length in this scenario
If it's inside of the loop the yes :point_up: but if it's not then simply  `{{ ARRAY|length }}`
